CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 21, 1959, pg. 9, reads: "Accent On Paris - Five of the beautiful young models who took part in D.I. fashion show-cabaret party Sunday night at the New Arena Supper Club show the extreme chic of their outfits...Far right, the real accent on Paris draws Nadiha Primas, left , in an Italian silk cocktail suit, deceptively simple, and lined with coral. A Betty Turner design.  Center: Beverly Robinson wears a Lanvin-Castillo trim frock, featuring the high empire waist and a low band just above the knees.  Right: Tall and red-haired Eugenia Hawthorne is stunning in this saucy black net cocktail gown by Jacques Helm.  The overblouse hangs free from the shoulders, and a separate net cape is tied at the neckline, making three tiers in all of sheer enchantment.  The, "hat" is the newest evening frill, of the same net.-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Nadiha Primas, Beverly Robinson, and Eugenia Smith Hawthorne wearing dark strapless dress with two rows of ruffles and veil, gathered around wooden bench with tufted cushion, in New Arena Supper Club for D.I.'s "March" benefit for the National Foundation
